title: Floods of Fear (1958 - United Kingdom) action adventure
description:
Floods of Fear (1958 - UK)

Action / Thriller / Adventure

director . . . . Charles Crichton
starring . . . . Howard Keel, Anne Heywood, Cyril Cusack
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0052812/


A hardened convict named Donovan escapes from a prison detail while helping build a barrier for an impending flood. The raging waters not only sweep away Donovan but also fellow prisoner Peebles, and guard Sharkey, who was supervising them. The trio wash up at the flooded farmhouse of Dr. Matthews who is away attending victims at a crisis center. At first the three survivors think the house is abandoned until Elizabeth, the doctor's daughter, appears and the tension begins.

Howard Keel recalled the filming in his autobiography: "All the flood scenes were filmed on one of the large stages at Pinewood Studios. The water had to be both dirty and cold, and it was. They couldn't heat it for fear it might get rancid. Anne Heywood never once protested about the water. Cyril Cusack and I were good friends. We had a little contest over Anne. He was a real cutie, as well as a hell of an actor, but I won out."


Video: XviD, 480x368, 25.000 fps, 1076 Kbps, 01h20m47s
